Module.Content: <APPLET CODE = "org.fantasme.chatirc.view.IRCApplet.class" ARCHIVE = "NchatIrc.jar" WIDTH = 600 HEIGHT = 600 > <PARAM NAME = "server" VALUE = "irc.recycled-irc.net"> <PARAM NAME = "port" VALUE = "6667"> <PARAM NAME = "nickname" VALUE = "ht5l_guest"> <PARAM NAME = "ident" VALUE = "ht5l"> </APPLET>
